name: Flipboard Dark
description:
A dark theme for Flipboard.

Source: https://github.com/Seanharrs/flipboard-dark
Bug reports: https://github.com/Seanharrs/flipboard-dark/issues
additional_info:
v1.5 - Fix missing styling for the mobile menu on about.flipboard.com and CSS cleanup
v1.4 - Fix improperly styled elements in the new Flipboard homepage
v1.3 - Fix updated sign up and sign in views
v1.2 - Fix styling of some links/buttons on the about.flipboard.com domain
v1.1 - Fix blog entry title colours. Style the share tools page and sitemap.
v1.0 - Initial styling of flipboard.com and about.flipboard.com. Some pages on the about domain are incomplete/missing.
